title: More shirts from McRapey
author: VD
content_html: Sadly, while McRapey’s latest t-shirt endeavor has received considerably more press than his Gamma Rabbit line, Amazon has decided to stop selling them due to their overly rapey theme.  We can only hope that his next project, Gamma Rabbit thongs for cisgendered men, will prove to be more successful.
content_text:
Sadly, while McRapey’s latest t-shirt endeavor has received
considerably more press
than his Gamma Rabbit line, Amazon has decided to stop selling them due to their overly rapey theme.  We can only hope that his next project, Gamma Rabbit thongs for cisgendered men, will prove to be more successful.
